name: A Simple Note
description:
Your name is Molly. You are a student at an all-female academy. An old friend of yours, Sam, has become such a bully in the past few years! She seems to ruffle everyone's feathers.

However, the tables are turned when suddenly Sam is the one being bullied... and harshly, too. Those who Sam mistreated seem to be jumping on the bandwagon, and the incidents are escalating. Can you figure out who the bully is?

Featuring:

  • Two potential outcomes, based on the player's choices!
  • Partially voiced content

__________________________________

__________________________________

This is the first game I've ever made! It made it for the Health Jam to teach myself the basics of Ren'Py. 

I'm incredibly nervous. I hope that you all like it. Any feedback would be appreciated!
